mapper.select: SELECT item_id, cate_code, item_name, item_price, item_amount, item_detail, item_sell_status FROM item WHERE item_sell_status = 'sell' ORDER BY item_id DESC

SELECT c.cate_code, c.cate_top, i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_detail, i.item_sell_status FROM category c INNER JOIN item i ON c.cate_code = i.cate_code WHERE cate_top = #{cateTop} and item_sell_status = 'sell' ORDER BY item_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item(item_id, cate_code, item_name, item_price ,item_amount, item_detail) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{cateCode}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemAmount}, #{itemDetail})
mapper.select: select M.img_name from item_img M inner join item I on I.item_id = M.item_id where I.item_id = #{value} and M.rep_img_yn= 'Y'
SELECT item_id, img_name, img_url FROM item_img where item_id = #{value}
SELECT i.item_id, m.img_name, m.img_url FROM item_img m INNER JOIN item i ON i.item_id = m.item_id WHERE img_name LIKE '%description%'
